summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the Flax implementations of various diffusion schedulers (DDIM, DDPMScheduler, PNDM) and shared scheduler utilities, checking configuration parsing, step calculations, schedule generation, variance handling, shape consistency, serialization, full diffusion loops, and model saving/loading.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of Flax-based diffusion scheduler components used in generative AI pipelines, enabling stable training and inference of diffusion models.
